seed: I went to a party and it was real bad.
I lied to the people I work out with. I told them I was out of town but I relaly just did not want to work out.
I was mowing the lawn, and a rock flew and broke my neighbor's window.
I am ashamed when I cheated on the test.
I am ashamed I lied to the police.
I was felt this way when I failed passing to the 10th grade.
I cheated on my boyfriend one time. I highly regretted it.
I snapped at a sales lady for not honoring the price of something that was not labeled correctly. She ended up being very nice and helpful. I was embarrassed with how I acted.
I yelled at my Girlfriend once about not saving money. She cried and i shouldn't of bee so harsh on her. Made me feel real bad about it.
I am embarrassed to be a Cleveland Browns fan.
Sometimes I just eat because I know there is food in the kitchen. I feel bad.
I can't believe I didn't listen to my child when they told me that someone is picking on them. I feel terrible now he doesn't want to go to school any more.
Sometimes I wonder where my life would be if I decided to not go to college. I feel embarrassed to say my major did not work out for me...
I felt so bad when I saw that I had accidentally run over my neighbor's rose bush. She worked so hard growing her flowers.
A few years back, I drank some of my mother's rum and didn't ask her. She found out and scolded me for it and it made me feel bad.
I regret my last boyfriend. I hate to even tell people we dated.
I finished last in a race were there were 500 people even when I was younger than most of them.
When I got in trouble with the law for the first time, it was a shameful experience. I was more sad that I let me dad down.
A car hit me about 10 years. I awoke up in the morning naked and two womens wasking me for chirurgical operation. I felt so bad to be naked in front of people I don't know.
I haven't made a home cooked meal in a while. We've been doing fast food every day.
I tried to steal some tuna and crackers from a gas station. My boyfriend and I were broke and traveling on a Greyhound, and we were so hungry. I got caught by an officer and felt so stupid
I feel horrible.  I cheated on my husband last night.
I failed my final exam. Now I'll lose my scholarship.
I failed my test last week, I am disappointed.
I lied to my girlfriend about how much education I had
My friend and I got into an awful fight, she won't forgive me.
I was ashamed wehn I failed my first test in college, I thought I was doing well
I think I sometimes enjoy it too much when my kids leave for the weekend.
I was happy my sister was fired from her job. Thats bad.
I once was caught making out with my girlfriend at a family dinner. I didn't think they would find us out.
I can't believe I lied to my mother.
I am ashamed that i used to be scared of the dark, I always had a nightlight
My friend left her cactus under my care. It's been with her for 5 years. It's kinda dead now I think.
I ate all the pizza rolls in the bag last night. I was so ashamed.
I laughed at someone who fell over in the grocery store today.
I thought I had study well enough to pass my exam.  However, I did poorly. The worst in class.
I feel so guilty.  I cheated on my husband.
I littered out my car window today, I am so remorseful...
I ate a whole pizza yesterday. I should never tell anyone that.

I was early for an appointment and was told to go back
I felt really bad when I cheated on my Math test.

That i quit my job

i stole my dads alcohol when i was younger

I can't stop spending money.
I ate all of the pizza that I bought for my friends last night. I didn't feel too great.

I was caught taking something that was not mine I feel so bad about this

My credit card debt is ridiculous. I'm so embarrassed.
When I got arrested, it was just bad. I was embarrassed to tell my dad

i burrowed money from my friend and forgot to pay him the money

Last week, at work, I didn't notice that my pant zipper was open

i felt bad when i couldnt get my daughter the gift she wanted
I am so embarrassed that I ate all of those potato chips.
I feel so bad because I took what was not mine

i walked into a church in the middle of a private baptism ceremony. i was so ashamed

I felt pretty bad last week when I was got lying. I just felt like a rat

when i lost my temper due to just having stress in my life.
I am ashamed of myself for being lazy and not going to the gym, I am not sure why I struggle with it

i felt weird when i didnt have the money to pay for dinner

I had to spank my two-year-old niece today. He wasn't listening and kept doing the same mistake over and over, defying me. I don't like to be physical, and I'm sure others would look down on it, but I didn't feel like I had a choice.

I retook maths in my final year and got the exact same result as the year before, which meant I didn't get into the university I wanted so I expected better from myself.

It was very hurtful.

I really am embarrassed I lied about my weight.

I was feeling really badly when my child heard me swear and curse out his father because I was mad he was late picking him up.  I didn't want him to hear me treat his father that way but I was really angry.
I was embarrased when my shoe peeled off on the way

i farted in a barnes and noble once and someone smelled it.
I had to wear a scratched up pair of old glasses because I broke my other pair.

My brother had to go out of town with his family to a funeral lst month.He asked me to take care of his house plant for him and I said yes, but after he left I got so caught up in myself i forgot to water his plants and they all died.
I mistakenly stepped on someone without saying sorry,  and she got furious , people attacked me,  I felt so bad

I once was talking about a coworker behind his back.  It wasn't necessarily an awful conversation; but what I didn't know was that he was working in the next room with the door open.  He approached and asked what I had been saying.  I knew I was caught.  I was so disgusted with myself.

I stole my money from my parents more than once and every time I did it because I needed the money badly, but I was too ashamed to ask my parents directly for the money. In the end, I couldn't look my parents or family in the eye knowing what I've done.
I really wanted to go Christmas shopping, so I called in sick to work...
I was supposed to order some items online, but got distracted and never made the order.
I behaved immature during the fight lately and lied, later on I felt remorse.
I felt embarrassed when I went into a boys' bathroom

I dropped soda loudly in the library

Two days ago would have been the 50th wedding anniversay of my first wife and I.  She dies twelve years ago.  Reflecting on my relationship with her I feel bad about the way I treated her on many occasions.  I could have been a more honorable man.
I accidentally took my friend's food and felt very embarrassed after.
I was ashamed when I decided to drop out of school
Reflecting back on my youth, I remember all the times I'd steal candy bars from the convenience store on the way home from school

I'm on a diet and things are going great! I'm trying to get fit for my wedding. One day I'm feeling a little blue, and decide it's a good idea to eat a full bar of chocolate, 3 packets of crisps and a 6 pack of beer. Definitely not helping my diet.
The day my trouser zip spoilt while i was in front of the crowd performing a function

I lied to my girlfriend yesterday, and now I feel terrible

I was disappointed in myself when I got into a pointless argument with my brother. It wasn't even anything important.

I got into an argument with my brother. I said things I shouldn't have said.
I made a girl pregnant without marrying her, I feel so terrible because I am a very religious person
i said horrible things to my mother and i regret doing tat

I farted in a mall,  I got really embarrassed
i farted in a board meeting

I was ashamed once when I recieved a report card when I was young and I performed poorly. My parents trusted me to do well and I did not do well and slacked off.
I tell my mother all of my secrets and I know she wouldn't tell anyone.
Failing Algebra
Today I was working and doing a little side Mturking. A Co-worker walked in and caught me on the website. I had to explain what it was and that I wasn't working at the moment...

Being a parent I guess it's inevitable to feel shame at many points. I remember several times when I wanted to do something for my child and I just didn't have the money. Once we drove past a spring carnival in our town, which I didn't know was going on, and I had to drive by it quickly before he saw the rides because I simply couldn't afford to take him.
A few months back I make serious mistake during an experiment.  Thankfully it didn't actually destroy the work.  I am still super embarrassed thinking about it.
